function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate estimation of infection growth rates based on anti-contagion policies and the counterfactual scenario","Impact":"Misguided decision-making and resource allocation based on flawed data","Mitigation":"Regular validation and cross-referencing of data with multiple sources, and consultation with domain experts","Technologies":"Data validation and cross-referencing tools, expert consultation platforms","People":"Policy-makers, public health officials, decision-makers","Owner":"Data analysts, domain experts, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for interactions between populations in nearby localities and mobility networks","Impact":"Failure to account for potential spread of infections between localities, leading to inadequate containment measures","Mitigation":"Integration of mobility and spatial interaction data into infection growth models, collaboration with geospatial experts","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, mobility and interaction modeling software","People":"Epidemiologists, geospatial experts, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Overreliance on reduced-form statistical approach without consideration of underlying mechanisms and processes","Impact":"Risk of overlooking important causal factors and dynamics affecting infection growth rates","Mitigation":"Integration of process-based epidemiological models, validation of statistical results with mechanistic models","Technologies":"Process-based epidemiological modeling software, model validation platforms","People":"Epidemiologists, data scientists, modelers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
